definitions: in an unassuming manner; without vanity or arrogance

examples.text: he modestly shrugged off the tributes from his manager

definitions: to a relatively moderate or small degree

examples.text: sales and profits have grown modestly in recent years

shortDefinitions: to relatively moderate or small degree

definitions: in a manner that is not elaborate or luxurious

examples.text: he lived modestly in a small house

shortDefinitions: in manner that is not elaborate or luxurious

definitions: so as to avoid impropriety or indecency

examples.text: women are expected to dress modestly

shortDefinitions: so as to avoid impropriety or indecency
